title: Role checks missing in store mutations
impact: Unauthorized destructive actions can bypass UI constraints
recommendation: Enforce RBAC guards in all DataContext mutators and reject unauthorized roles

title: Sensitive temporary password exposed in logs
impact: Credential leakage risk in shared environments
recommendation: Remove secret logs and gate demo auth behind environment flags

title: Mixed legacy and new workflow statuses
impact: Ambiguous state transitions and inconsistent UX labels
recommendation: Define canonical status set and migration mapping

title: Monolithic DataContext causes broad rerenders
impact: Higher coupling and performance regressions under growth
recommendation: Split context by domain and add selectors

title: Heavy localStorage persistence on each slice update
impact: Main-thread pressure and potential jank on frequent updates
recommendation: Throttle/batch persistence or move to indexed storage worker

title: Touch target failures across mobile and tablet (resolved)
impact: Tap precision issues and interaction errors
recommendation: Normalized interactive hit areas and fixed QA auth routing to produce valid device audits

title: Visual regression baseline fully diverged
impact: Regression risk hidden by unstable baselines
recommendation: Run visual triage and update baseline only for approved changes

title: Bundle chunk exceeds warning limit
impact: Slower initial load especially on low bandwidth
recommendation: Code-split PDF/XLSX flows and lazy load heavy vendors

title: Mojibake in budget modal labels
recommendation: Fix UTF-8 strings and run text consistency pass

title: Admin deleting SuperAdmin blocked by business rule
recommendation: Keep regression test for this guard
